title: Border, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Brussels style bobbin lace
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Floral border showing alternating motifs of vases and birds. Fond: Droschel. Modes: brides picotées, venises, portes, amures.
